includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: David Boreanaz (Angel) returns to screens as an FBI agent teamed with a feisty anthropologist to crack crimes using victims' bones. Scientific drama fizzing with chemistry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: David Boreanaz (Angel) returns to screens as an FBI agent teamed with a feisty anthropologist to crack crimes using victims' bones.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: David Boreanaz (Angel) returns to screens as an FBI agent teamed with a feisty anthropologist to crack crimes using victims' bones. Scientific drama fizzing with chemistry.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, mature themes, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: The Man in the SUV
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - The Man in the SUV
includedAssets.synopsis: Was he a terrorist or was he framed? The forensic and detective duo investigate the case of a suspected suicide bomber. Charismatic crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Was he a terrorist or was he framed? The forensic and detective duo investigate the case of a suspected suicide bomber. Charismatic crime drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Was he a terrorist or was he framed? The forensic and detective duo investigate the case of a suspected suicide bomber. Charismatic crime drama.

includedAssets.title: A Boy in a Tree
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - A Boy in a Tree
includedAssets.synopsis: Forensic expert Brennan and FBI agent Booth head to an elite prep school where a student was hanged. Suicide or murder? Sparky crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Forensic expert Brennan and FBI agent Booth head to an elite prep school where a student was hanged. Suicide or murder? Sparky crime drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Forensic expert Brennan and FBI agent Booth head to an elite prep school where a student was hanged. Suicide or murder? Sparky crime drama.

includedAssets.title: The Man in the Bear
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep4 - The Man in the Bear
includedAssets.synopsis: Sparky detective duo Brennan and Booth investigate a human arm found in the stomach of a black bear.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sparky detective duo Brennan and Booth investigate a human arm found in the stomach of a black bear.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sparky detective duo Brennan and Booth investigate a human arm found in the stomach of a black bear.

includedAssets.title: A Boy In A Bush
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep5 - A Boy In A Bush
includedAssets.synopsis: Detective Booth and anthropologist Brennan investigate the assault and murder of a boy found in a field. Scientific drama with added chemistry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Detective Booth and anthropologist Brennan investigate the assault and murder of a boy found in a field. Scientific drama with added chemistry.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Detective Booth and anthropologist Brennan investigate the assault and murder of a boy found in a field. Scientific drama with added chemistry.

includedAssets.title: The Man In The Wall
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - The Man In The Wall
includedAssets.synopsis: Booth and Brennan are intrigued by the mummified body of a hip-hop DJ, unearthed behind the wall of a nightclub.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Booth and Brennan are intrigued by the mummified body of a hip-hop DJ, unearthed behind the wall of a nightclub.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Booth and Brennan are intrigued by the mummified body of a hip-hop DJ, unearthed behind the wall of a nightclub.

includedAssets.title: A Man On Death Row
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - A Man On Death Row
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan and Booth suspect a condemned man may be innocent, and fight for his stay of execution. It's when they exhume a body that doubts emerge.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan and Booth suspect a condemned man may be innocent, and fight for his stay of execution. It's when they exhume a body that doubts emerge.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brennan and Booth suspect a condemned man may be innocent, and fight for his stay of execution. It's when they exhume a body that doubts emerge.

includedAssets.title: The Girl In The Fridge
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep8 - The Girl In The Fridge
includedAssets.synopsis: When Brennan testifies in a case involving a dead woman found in a fridge, she crosses the path of an ex-boyfriend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Brennan testifies in a case involving a dead woman found in a fridge, she crosses the path of an ex-boyfriend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Brennan testifies in a case involving a dead woman found in a fridge, she crosses the path of an ex-boyfriend.

includedAssets.title: The Man In The Fallout Shelter
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep9 - The Man In The Fallout Shelter
includedAssets.synopsis: An unidentified body is discovered in a bomb shelter. During the investigation, Brennan & Booth are quarantined in the lab. And it's Christmas...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An unidentified body is discovered in a bomb shelter. During the investigation, Brennan & Booth are quarantined in the lab. And it's Christmas...

includedAssets.title: The Woman At The Airport
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep10 - The Woman At The Airport
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan and Booth struggle to identify a dismembered woman with extensive plastic surgery. Their investigation leads to an LA call-girl ring.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan and Booth struggle to identify a dismembered woman with extensive plastic surgery. Their investigation leads to an LA call-girl ring.

includedAssets.title: The Woman In The Car
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep11 - The Woman In The Car
includedAssets.synopsis: When a burned-out car with a charred body and a kid's shoe is found, Booth fears not only murder but kidnapping. And the kidnappers soon get gruesome...

includedAssets.title: The Superhero In The Alley
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep12 - The Superhero In The Alley
includedAssets.synopsis: A teenage boy, who had comics instead of friends, is found dead. Brennan feels an affinity for the loner and resolves to find his killer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A teenage boy, who had comics instead of friends, is found dead. Brennan feels an affinity for the loner and resolves to find his killer.

includedAssets.title: The Woman In The Garden
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep13 - The Woman In The Garden
includedAssets.synopsis: A man is found with a dug-up corpse in the boot of his car. Booth and Brennan find where the woman was buried, but they also find a second empty grave.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A man is found with a dug-up corpse in the boot of his car. Booth and Brennan find where the woman was buried, but they also find a second empty grave.

includedAssets.title: The Man On The Fairway
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep14 - The Man On The Fairway
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan and Zack are called to the crash site of a small jet, where they discover some small bone fragments which may be linked to a missing local man.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan and Zack are called to the crash site of a small jet, where they discover some small bone fragments which may be linked to a missing man.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brennan and Zack are called to the crash site of a small jet, where they discover some small bone fragments which may be linked to a missing local man.

includedAssets.title: Two Bodies In The Lab
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep15 - Two Bodies In The Lab
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan is the target of a failed shooting, and Booth is caught in a bomb explosion. Are these events connected to the two bodies they are investigating?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan is the target of a shooting, and Booth is caught in a bomb explosion. Are these events connected to the two bodies they are investigating?

includedAssets.title: The Woman In The Tunnel
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep16 - The Woman In The Tunnel
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan and Booth accept the help of a homeless man as they search an abandoned tunnel system, hoping to solve the murder of a documentary filmmaker.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan and Booth accept the help of a homeless man as they search an abandoned tunnel system, hoping to solve the murder of a documentary filmmaker.

includedAssets.title: The Skull In The Desert
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep17 - The Skull In The Desert
includedAssets.synopsis: While on holiday in the desert, Angela contacts Brennan to ask for her help in identifying a skull she fears may be her boyfriend's.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While on holiday in the desert, Angela contacts Brennan to ask for her help in identifying a skull she fears may be her boyfriend's.

includedAssets.title: The Man With The Bone
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep18 - The Man With The Bone
includedAssets.synopsis: A dead body is found clutching a 300 year-old finger bone. Brennan and Booth's investigations lead them into an underwater mystery.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A dead body is found clutching a 300 year-old finger bone. Brennan and Booth's investigations lead them into an underwater mystery.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A dead body is found clutching a 300 year-old finger bone. Brennan and Booth's investigations lead them into an underwater mystery.

includedAssets.title: The Man In The Morgue
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep19 - The Man In The Morgue
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan wakes up in a motel beaten and bloodied, unable to remember what happened. She calls in Booth to decipher her missing hours.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan wakes up in a motel beaten and bloodied, unable to remember what happened. She calls in Booth to decipher her missing hours.

includedAssets.title: The Graft In The Girl
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep20 - The Graft In The Girl
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a bone graft given to a cancer sufferer when they believe that a terminally ill girl may have been the victim of a crime.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a bone graft given to a cancer patient when they believe that a terminally ill girl may have been the victim of a crime.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a bone graft given to a cancer sufferer when they believe that a terminally ill girl may have been the victim of a crime.

includedAssets.title: The Soldier In The Grave
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep21 - The Soldier In The Grave
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan and Booth probe the apparent suicide of a war protester. Their investigations force Booth to relive the horrors he saw as an army sniper.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan and Booth probe the apparent suicide of a war protester. Their investigations force Booth to relive the horrors he saw as an army sniper.

includedAssets.title: The Woman In Limbo
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep22 - The Woman In Limbo
includedAssets.synopsis: The remains of a Jane Doe turn out to be those of Brennan's missing mother. As dark family secrets are uncovered, Brennan faces a new reality.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance “Bones” Brennan (Emily Deschanel) joins forces with FBI special agent Seeley Booth (David Boreanaz) to investigate murders where the only remnants of the victims are their bones. Smash-hit crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Forensic anthropologist "Bones" Brennan (Emily Deschanel) and FBI agent Seeley Booth (David Boreanaz) solve murders using victims' bones.
